invalidUserOrPass: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
errorNetwork: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
anErrorOccured: An error occurred. Please check your network connection and try again.
installAppSafariInstructions:
1. Open Safari and go to this page. 
2. Tap the Share button (square with upward arrow). 
3. Scroll down and select 'Add to Home Screen'. 
4. Tap 'Add'. 
5. Find the app icon on your home screen and tap to open.
inventoryOverview: This section gives you an overview of your current inventory status.
historySummary: Here you can view a summary of your activity history.
